person.content:
Please identify the "Person" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Person". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: Switzerland stands accused by Senator Alfonse D'Amato , chairman of the powerful U.S. Senate Banking Committee , of agreeing to give money to Poland from unclaimed bank accounts of Polish citizens , as part of an accord on compensating Swiss nationals whose assets had been seized in communist Poland .

Let's think step by step.

| Person |
|--------|
| Senator Alfonse D'Amato |
| Chairman of the powerful U.S. Senate Banking Committee |
| Switzerland |
| Polish citizens |

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

|--------|
